actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The drider makes a claws attack and then either a bite or longsword attack. Alternatively  it makes two longbow attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). While grappling a target  the drider can't attack a different target with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one grappled creature. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Longsword (wielded two-handed)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The drider can use its climb speed even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the drider has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Perception checks that rely on sight.

special_abilities.name: Web Walker
special_abilities.desc: The drider ignores movement restrictions imposed by webs.
